snippet: The players union let a self-imposed deadline for disbanding itself pass, indicating that progress was being made in negotiations to end the lockout that has stretched into its 110th day.
abstract: NHL players' union allows self-imposed deadline for disbanding itself to pass, indicating that progress is being made in negotiations to end prolonged lockout.
lead_paragraph: The players union let a self-imposed deadline for disbanding itself pass, indicating that progress was being made in negotiations to end the lockout that has stretched into its 110th day.

headline.seo: Talks Reaching Tipping Point in N.H.L. Lockout
headline.main: Talks Reaching Tipping Point in N.H.L. Lockout
headline.print_headline: Talks Reaching Tipping Point in N.H.L. Lockout
